name: Oath of the Crown
description: These paladins devote themselves to the ideals of civilization and the rule of law.

3.name: Champion Challenge
3.description: As a bonus action, compel creatures you choose within 30 feet to make a Wisdom save or be unable to willingly move more than 30 feet away from you.

3.name: Turn the Tide
3.description: As a bonus action, each creature of your choice within 30 feet that can hear you regains 1d6 + your Charisma modifier hit points if it has no more than half its hit points.

7.name: Divine Allegiance
7.description: When a creature within 5 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to take the damage instead.

15.name: Unyielding Spirit
15.description: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid becoming paralyzed or stunned.

20.name: Exalted Champion
20.description: For 1 hour, you gain resistance to nonmagical weapon damage, allies within 30 feet have advantage on death saves, and you and allies within 30 feet have advantage on Wisdom saves. Once per long rest.
